alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:22PM CDT until July 22 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marion County in south central Mississippi... Southern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 322 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bassfield, or 10 miles southeast of Prentiss, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Melba around 335 PM CDT. Sumrall around 345 PM CDT. Seminary around 350 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
